product_name: La Roche-PosayCicaplast B5 Lip Balm for Dry Lips
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsDiscover La Roche-Posay Cicaplast B5 Lip Balm for Dry Lips, a light, non-greasy lip treatment that helps repair the skin barrier by locking in moisture.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrates dry to extra dry lipsSoftens chapped lipsSoothes and relieves sensitive lipsNon-greasy textureKey IngredientsWith La Roche-Posay Thermal Spring WaterIts formula is concentrated in soothing and repairing Panth√©nol, for an immediate relief. It is enriched with MP-Lipids, a pro-hydration active ingredientFormulated WithoutFragranceItem 2611317How To UseApply to dry lips as needed.IngredientsCaprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ppg-5 Pentaerythrityl Ether, Peg-5 Pentaerythrityl Ether, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter/Shea Butter, Cera Alba/Beeswax, Panthenol, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Silica Silylate, Polybutene, Glycine Soja/Soybean Sterols, Aqua/Water, Sodium Saccharin, Myristyl Malate Phosphonic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate.
how_to_use: Apply to dry lips as needed.

reviews.headline: Hydrating!
reviews.comments: Love this balm. Very moisturizing. Would purchase again.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I bought this when I couldn't get rid of the dry skin around my lips and my nose after I was sick. It truly does feel like a barrier and it came to my rescue when aquaphor wasn't working. Would buy again!!

reviews.headline: Good stuff
reviews.comments: It's definitely good. I love la roche posay. Works nicely to hydrate your lips.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: It very hydrating

reviews.headline: Repurchased 3x
reviews.comments: I love this stuff! I've repurchased 3 times now! I originally bought it because I had to overhaul my skincare due to perioral dermatitis, and had to get rid of all my scented lip balms. I also found petrolatum personally made my dermatitis worse, so none of the usual go-to unscented options were good for me. But this stuff? Chef's kiss.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I love most of La Roche Posay's products, but this just flat doesn't work. It truly makes your lips more chapped than when you started.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I love this lip balm. I see similarities between this and aquaphor

reviews.headline: This made my lips worse
reviews.comments: After using this product for three days, I noticed it made my lips worse. I was wondering why my lips were so dry and cracked all of a sudden. This is the only new lip treatment I decided to use to prep my lips.  Definitely will throw away.

reviews.headline: This stuff works!
reviews.comments: After a trip I had extremely dry and chapped lips. Regular lip balm wasn't helping at all. I did some looking online and this lip balm was highly recommended, and I have used La Roche Posay's eczema cream which I really like so decided to try this. My lips instantly felt better, and after using it after a couple of days they definitely had improved. I would recommend this and will definitely buy it again.

reviews.headline: Not Moisturizing Enough
reviews.comments: I tried this product because I Have very dry lips but I don't notice any improvements when I use this product.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again!
reviews.comments: This product is so good.It leaves my lips very moisturized and I don't feel the need to keep applying it every second of the day. The hydration factor is top notch.

reviews.headline: My new fav lip balm
reviews.comments: I dont think i can live without this. It truly hydrates your lips and lasts. One of the best lip balms ive ever used.

reviews.headline: My new fav lip balm
reviews.comments: I dont think i can live without this. It truly hydrates your lips and lasts. One of the best lip balms ive ever used.

reviews.headline: Nice but doesn't beat aquaphor
reviews.comments: Goes on smooth and keeps lips hydrated for a good amount of time. I just prefer how long aquaphor lasts and how it makes lips look shiny

reviews.headline: Nice but doesn't beat aquaphor
reviews.comments: Goes on smooth and keeps lips hydrated for a good amount of time. I just prefer how long aquaphor lasts and how it looks (shiny)

reviews.headline: New fave added to the mix
reviews.comments: picked one up for the first time in a pharmacy in paris. really good stuff hoping the quality in the states doesnt downgrade my rating.

reviews.headline: Feels like nothing
reviews.comments: I like this product solely for the texture and longevity of the wear. It honestly feels like I am wearing nothing when  I put it on, which feels nice. I always have something on my lips and I do a lip tratment every night, so I cannot comment on if it is hydrating in dry lips or not(I know it for sure isn't drying). It does have a taste that's a little weird but I can get past that due to how comfortable it feels.

reviews.headline: No i wouldn't buy again
reviews.comments: Isnt moisturizing like it said would be

reviews.headline: Saved my lips!
reviews.comments: I have exzema on my lips and it became so uncomfortable. I purchased this because I needed something very gentle and it truly helped me! Only con is that it doesn't come in a larger packaging.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: For being so pricy I thought this would work better. Doesn't feel very moisturizing and does not last on my lips at all,

media.headline: Love it.
media.caption: I used it until it's all gone.

media.headline: Empty Tube
media.caption: The first use and had just air in it.

media.headline: Honest review
media.caption: My love for this company is ENDLESS. Their products saved my skin after 15 rounds of radiation!!! Highly recommend!!!!

faceoff_positive.comments: Since I've started using this balm , it has been nothing short of amazing! I suffer from moderate eczema that would affect my face . This time it was around my mouth and it hadn't gotten any bested for over a month . After using this product I wont ever use anything else . It has completely healed my lips and they're actually retaining moisture!! I'm so In live with this!
faceoff_positive.headline: Absolute game changer!

faceoff_negative.comments: There is less than 15% product in the tube when i bought it and it doesn't comeout when i press it with both hands with all my strength.
faceoff_negative.headline: Empty Tube

rollup.name: Cicaplast B5 Lip Balm for Dry Lips
